function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Disproportionate impact on low-skilled workers, women, youths, and marginalized individuals","Impact":"Exacerbation of inequality of income and opportunity","Mitigation":"Targeted support for vulnerable groups, revamping education, and new training programs","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Low-skilled workers, women, youths, marginalized individuals","Owner":"Policymakers"},{"Description":"Acceleration of robot adoption displacing low-skilled workers","Impact":"Growing disparities, long-lasting grievances, and social unrest","Mitigation":"Preventing scarring effects on the livelihoods of the most vulnerable, revamping education, and addressing skill mismatches","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Low-skilled workers, policymakers","Owner":"Policymakers"},{"Description":"Challenges in acquiring new and challenging skill sets leading to a persistent increase in dropouts","Impact":"Potential failure of training programs and persistent increase in dropouts","Mitigation":"Revamping education, new training programs, and income redistribution","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Workers, policymakers","Owner":"Policymakers"}]}
